Articles.Content:
I finally built it after promising to a few months ago, the H44 battleship. I had planned to build it after finishing the Britannic but never got round to building it, luckily today I had the day off of school and decided to spend my time building this:

More screenshots will come soon and I will post a video on my Youtube channel about this craft.

It comes in at 45 parts thanks to Ubiozur welding, otherwise it would have come in at ~1330 parts

In real life the H44 was a proposed Super battleship that was planned by Germany during WWII to battle the allied fleets. She was to be 345m in length and displace 131,000 tons making her by far the largest ship afloat at the time. Before the battleship was even laid down the project was cancelled and the largest warship ever was simply never built.
Tomorrow, I have to get some sleep soon.
